FileFormat.FormatDescription: Corel R.A.V.E. (Real Animated Vector Effects) is the vector-based animation application which comes bundled as part of the CorelDRAW Graphics Suite (starting in version 10).
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Museum of London / Museum of London
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 08/2023 (v.113)- Added priority over fmt/1886 (Resource Interchange Format (RIFF)) and updated description. Submitted by New York Public Libraries and Preservica.; 11/2023 (v.115)- Modified the offset values in the internal signature from null to 0 as part of a project to match PRONOM data with the xsd standard. Internally researched.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: ASCII: RIFF{4}CARBvrsn (where B is the version)
